CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 17, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "Observe Building Sketch - Lawson and Lawson (left) are seen showing certain officers of the Allegheny Union Baptist Association an architects drawing of the proposed new Aged Ministers and Laymens' Home... The site for the new building will be announced, with the officers of the association and its auxiliaries, in a subsequent issue of The Courier. - Harris Photo."Cutline for cropped version image that may have been published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "Baptist Home - Through efforts of the Baptists in area, the Allegheny Union Baptist Association is past preliminary planning to erect this home for aged ministers, laymen."
TitMainTitle: Two men, the Lawson brothers standing behind architectural rendering of Allegheny Union Baptist Association Aged Ministers' and Laymen's Home, posed in church with arched windows
